title: 'Dope' Director On Geekdom, The N-Word And Confronting Racism With Comedy
teaser: Rick Famuyiwa's new film is about a black high-school student who's into 90s hip hop and Japanese comic books. He calls Dope a celebration of kids whose interests don't fit into pop-culture norms.
